import { React, useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Field, reduxForm } from "redux-form"; import { CCard, CCardBody, CCardHeader, CButton, CForm, CFormGroup, CLabel, CCardFooter, CRow, CCol, CInputFile, } from "@coreui/react"; import UserService from "../../../../../services/user.service"; import heic2any from "heic2any"; const AddCuppingForm = (props) => { const { handleSubmit, reset } = props; const [product, setProduct] = useState([]); const onCertificateChanges = (e) => { const file = e.target.files[0]; console.log(file); const fileName = file.name.split('.')[0]; const fileExtension = file.name.split('.').pop(); if (fileExtension=== 'HEIC'){ heic2any({ blob: file, toType: "image/png", quality: 1 }).then( (newImage) => { console.log("new image:", newImage); // const url = URL.createObjectURL(newImage); var newFile = new File([newImage], fileName + ".png", {type:"image/png", lastModified:new Date().getTime()}); props.onSelectCertificate(newFile); } ); } else{ props.onSelectCertificate(file); } }; useEffect(() => { getProduct(); }, []); const getProduct = async () => { UserService.getListProduct().then((response) => { console.log("cek ini mal", response) setProduct(response.data.product); }); }; return (

Add Cupping

 X Product {product && product.map((value) => { return ( ); })} Curated Date Curated By Fragrance / Aroma Flavor Aftertaste Acidity Body Cupping Score Category Cupping Certificate Submit {" "} Reset
); }; export default reduxForm({ form: "addCupping", // a unique identifier for this form })(AddCuppingForm);
